abstract: Carlos Manuel Bocanegra (born May 25, 1979) is an American professional soccer player for Chivas USA in Major League Soccer. He is also the former captain of the United States men's national soccer team.
comment: Carlos Manuel Bocanegra (born May 25, 1979) is an American professional soccer player for Chivas USA in Major League Soccer. He is also the former captain of the United States men's national soccer team.
